scenes.name: Mitsuha's Morning Confusion
scenes.summary: Mitsuha wakes up in Taki's body, confused and overwhelmed by the unfamiliar urban surroundings.
scenes.firstLine: I'm in my room. It's morning.
scenes.lastLine: In that two-second span, the sense of unity that enveloped me a moment earlier vanishes without a trace, without an echo.

characters.name: Mitsuha
characters.quote: Every so often when I wake up in the morning, for some reason, I'm crying.

scenes.name: Taki's Morning Routine
scenes.summary: Taki, in Mitsuha's body, begins a typical morning not realizing the body swap.
scenes.lastLine: I tie the necktie I've finally gotten used to, then put on my jacket.

characters.name: Taki
characters.quote: I've been dreaming.

scenes.name: Discovery of a New Self
scenes.summary: Mitsuha, in Taki's body, explores and tries to cope with the physical changes and new environment.
scenes.firstLine: I get through the turnstile at the crowded station, take the escalator down...
scenes.lastLine: This world is far too dazzling.

characters.name: Mitsuha
characters.quote: Before I know it, just like always, as I gaze out over those streets... I'm... looking for someone. Just one person.

scenes.name: The Ringtone and the Train Encounter
scenes.summary: Taki, confused by a strange ringtone, finds himself on a train where he meets a mysterious girl claiming to be Mitsuha.
scenes.firstLine: I don't recognize that ringtone, I think drowsily.

characters.name: Taki
characters.quote: No, I don't know you.

scenes.name: Awakening to a New Identity
scenes.summary: Taki awakens in his own body, processing the reality of his connection to Mitsuha and their body swapping.
scenes.firstLine: Suddenly, the train stops, and the doors open.

characters.name: Taki
characters.quote: My hands gravitate toward them as naturally as an apple falling to the ground.

scenes.name: Discovery and Disbelief
scenes.summary: Mitsuha, in a male body, faces the shocking reality of her transformation and the unfamiliarity of the surroundings.

characters.name: Mitsuha
characters.quote: What is...this?

scenes.name: Awkward Adjustments
scenes.summary: Mitsuha struggles to adjust to Taki's life in Tokyo, encountering unfamiliar tasks and responsibilities.
scenes.firstLine: Breakfast was your job today, kid. Remember? You overslept.
scenes.lastLine: I twist the faucet, fill my hands with tap water, and drink.

characters.name: Mitsuha
characters.quote: My throat is bone-dry.

scenes.name: Taki's Quest Begins
scenes.summary: Taki, armed with drawings and memories of Mitsuha's town, starts his journey to discover the truth behind his mysterious connection with Mitsuha.
scenes.lastLine: Having made that resolution, I feel the tension drain from my stiff body for the first time in a long while.

characters.name: Taki
characters.quote: This weekend, I'll head out.

scenes.name: Mitsuha's Resolve
scenes.summary: Mitsuha, realizing her past and present might not align, takes desperate measures to confirm her existence and fate.
scenes.lastLine: It's really there! It wasn't a dream!

characters.name: Mitsuha
characters.quote: It's really there! It wasn't a dream!

scenes.name: Crisis Unfolding
scenes.summary: As Mitsuha and her friends enact their plan to save the town, they face unforeseen challenges and opposition.

characters.name: Mitsuha
characters.quote: We'll never get the people around here to move without committing a crime.

characters.name: Tesshi
characters.quote: I'm the explosives guy!

characters.name: Saya
characters.quote: That's a full-blown crime!

scenes.name: Cosmic Awareness
scenes.summary: Taki experiences a profound cosmic connection, realizing the extensive history of comet impacts and their consequences on Itomori.
scenes.lastLine: Then, with a brutal sensation, the umbilical cord is cut.

characters.name: Taki
characters.quote: In the midst of this indistinct floating sensation, the comet shines in the night sky.

scenes.name: Mitsuha's Realization
scenes.summary: Mitsuha, re-experiencing her own body, realizes she is alive and reflects on her connections and memories.
scenes.firstLine: My eyes open. In that instant, I know for sure.
scenes.lastLine: The astronomy spectacular that only comes once every twelve centuries has reached its climax, and various festivities will be held all around the...

characters.name: Mitsuha
characters.quote: It's Mitsuha... She's alive...!

scenes.name: Struggle, Magnificently
scenes.summary: Mitsuha runs through the woods, determined to save her town from the impending disaster, as she keeps Taki's memory alive.
scenes.firstLine: I run. I'm sprinting down a dark deer track, repeating his name again and again.
scenes.lastLine: You better gimme the whole story later!

characters.name: Mitsuha
characters.quote: Taki, Taki, Taki. It's all right. I remember. I'll never forget.

characters.name: Tesshi
characters.quote: Mitsuha! Where the heck you been?!

scenes.name: Confrontation and Despair
scenes.summary: Mitsuha confronts her father, the mayor, to try to persuade him to evacuate the town, but faces rejection and disbelief.
scenes.firstLine: I feel as if I've picked up an unexpected ally. I can't hold still any longer.
scenes.lastLine: Don't you talk down to me, you bastard!

characters.name: Mitsuha
characters.quote: How dare you come to me with nonsense like that!

characters.name: Mayor Miyamizu
characters.quote: Listen, Mitsuha. If you're being serious with me, then you are ill.

scenes.name: Memories and Resolution
scenes.summary: Mitsuha reflects on her memories and experiences, fueling her resolve to change her fate and that of her town.
scenes.firstLine: I'm standing on a rock-littered mountain peak, all alone.
scenes.lastLine: What was I doing way out here?

characters.name: Mitsuha
characters.quote: I finally understand. I'm in love. We're in love.

scenes.name: Search for Connection
scenes.summary: Taki, dressed for an interview, reminisces about his high school years and his unresolved feelings.
scenes.firstLine: I have a few habits I've unconsciously picked up.
scenes.lastLine: I don't know what wish accompanies those words, but somewhere along the way, I've started longing for it.

characters.name: Taki
characters.quote: I look away from my right hand, gazing absently out the window instead.

scenes.name: Final Resolution and Disaster
scenes.summary: As the comet approaches, Mitsuha, empowered by her love and resolve, confronts her father to save the town.
scenes.firstLine: I'm not afraid of anything now. I'm not scared of anyone. I'm not lonely anymore.
scenes.lastLine: And so I'll live. I'll survive this.

characters.name: Mitsuha
characters.quote: That means we'll meet again. I'm sure of it.

scenes.name: The Comet's Impact
scenes.summary: The comet strikes Itomori, causing a catastrophic disaster and reshaping the landscape and lives of the town's residents.
scenes.firstLine: The meteorite instantly destroyed a wide area, centered on the shrine.
scenes.lastLine: It reflects the sun in the midst of a faint morning haze, endlessly serene.

characters.name: Mitsuha
characters.quote: Even if the stars fall, I will live.

scenes.name: Final Reunion
scenes.summary: Mitsuha and Taki finally meet after the disaster, sharing a moment of connection as they confirm each other's identity.
scenes.firstLine: In that instant, with absolutely no warning, I see her.
scenes.lastLine: Like children who've agreed to go on the count of three, we say together: What's your name?

characters.name: Mitsuha
characters.quote: I finally found him. We finally met.

characters.name: Taki
characters.quote: Seeing this, he smiles. Even as I cry, I smile, too.

locations.name: Itomori
locations.quote: The meteorite instantly destroyed a wide area, centered on the shrine. The destruction wasn't limited to houses and the forest. The impact gouged a huge hole in the ground, forming a crater nearly half a mile across.

locations.name: Tokyo
locations.quote: Below lies a generous carpet of greenery, like a large park. The sky is a vivid cerulean blue, without the slightest blemish. On the border between the blue and green, ranks of buildings of all sizes line up neatly, like extra-intricate origami.

locations.name: Itomori Town Hall
locations.quote: Mitsuha confronts her father, the mayor, to try to persuade him to evacuate the town, but faces rejection and disbelief.

characters.quote: I'm biting back laughter, and Tesshi's sulking.
characters.explanation: A soft pink, reflecting her youth, femininity, and the emotional turbulence she experiences.

characters.quote: The green can be a field. The orange is flowers and butterflies.
characters.explanation: A calming blue, symbolizing his depth and reflective nature, often looking to the skies and dreaming of connections.

characters.quote: Technically, they're called water-gel explosives. They're kinda like dynamite.
characters.explanation: A vibrant orange, representing his energetic, sometimes explosive personality and technical enthusiasm.

characters.quote: B-but that's... That's a full-blown crime!
characters.explanation: A lighter shade of orange, less intense than Tesshi's but still warm and engaging, highlighting her supportive yet cautious nature.

characters.quote: Listen, Mitsuha. If you're being serious with me, then you are ill.
characters.explanation: A dark brown, signifying his traditional and rigid demeanor, deeply rooted and often inflexible.
